conversations.description: Author uploads a draft on renewable energy, the AI extracts sections, checks structure against Nature Energy guidelines, and suggests adding a separate 'Data Availability' section.
Researcher submits a manuscript on CRISPR editing; PeerReviewAI runs a plagiarism check, flags a 22% similarity with a preprint, and recommends paraphrasing the overlapping method description.
User provides a list of references; the system queries CrossRef to add missing DOIs, corrects misspelled journal names, and highlights a retracted paper for removal.
Graduate student asks for language polishing; the AI runs a grammar check, flags passive‑voice overuse in the discussion, and suggests clearer alternatives for technical jargon.

Author targets the Journal of Machine Learning Research; the assistant compares the manuscript’s section order with the journal’s template and advises moving the 'Experiments' section before 'Related Work.'
Manuscript on COVID‑19 vaccine efficacy is ingested; the AI searches recent literature, returns five missing seminal papers, and proposes citing them in the introduction.
PhD candidate uploads a LaTeX‑derived PDF; PeerReviewAI parses figures and tables, detects a missing caption for Figure 3, and adds a suggested descriptive caption.
User requests a citation style conversion; the system reformats the bibliography from APA to IEEE and verifies each entry’s DOI.
Author with multilingual manuscript receives language quality feedback, identifying improper use of scientific terms in the Spanish abstract.
Research team asks for an executive summary; the AI generates a concise overview highlighting objectives, methods, key results, and suggested improvements.
Manuscript on quantum computing shows a 30% similarity score; the AI pinpoints the exact passages that match a previously published article and offers rewrite suggestions.
User asks for a quick structural audit; PeerReviewAI notes that the methods section lacks a subheading for 'Statistical Analysis' and recommends adding it.
Author wants to ensure all references are up‑to‑date; the AI flags three citations older than ten years and suggests newer, high‑impact alternatives.
Paper on climate modeling lacks a clear abstract; the system drafts a revised abstract that meets the target journal’s length requirement.
User uploads a manuscript with embedded tables; the AI extracts table data, checks for consistency with the text, and flags a mismatched value in Table 2.
Researcher seeks to improve readability; the language check highlights long sentences in the results and offers split‑sentence alternatives.
Author targeting a medical journal receives a report indicating excessive use of abbreviations and receives a list of recommended expansions.
Manuscript on nanomaterials includes a figure with low resolution; the AI advises replacing it with a 300‑dpi version and suggests a better caption.
User asks for missing literature; the literature suggestion tool returns ten recent papers on biodegradable polymers relevant to the discussion.
Graduate student submits a draft; PeerReviewAI runs all checks and exports a comprehensive markdown report with sections for citations, plagiarism, language, and structure.
Author wonders if any references are duplicated; the citation check detects two identical entries and proposes consolidation.
Manuscript on AI ethics contains a controversial claim; the AI flags it, provides source verification, and suggests adding a citation or rephrasing.
User wants to know if the manuscript fits the word limit of 5,000 words; the system counts words and suggests trimming the literature review by 300 words.
Paper includes a supplementary file; PeerReviewAI verifies that all supplementary figures are referenced in the main text.
Author asks for a list of potential reviewers; the AI generates a markdown list of experts based on the manuscript’s topic and recent publications.
Manuscript on bioinformatics pipelines lacks a flowchart; the assistant suggests adding a schematic and provides a template.
User provides an abstract only; PeerReviewAI extracts key concepts, searches for gaps, and recommends three additional references to strengthen background.
Research team needs help with reference formatting for a special issue; the AI reformats all citations to the issue’s custom style.
Author receives a plagiarism similarity of 12%; the AI confirms it is within acceptable range and explains why the matches are benign.
Manuscript contains inconsistent tense usage; language quality check normalizes all sections to present tense as required by the target journal.
User requests a quick check for statistical reporting errors; the AI flags a missing confidence interval in the results section.
Paper on solar cell efficiency lacks a clear hypothesis; structural suggestion adds a dedicated 'Hypothesis' subheading in the introduction.
Author wants to ensure no self‑plagiarism; the system cross‑checks the manuscript against the author's previous publications.
Manuscript includes a DOI that resolves to a retracted article; citation check flags it and suggests an alternative source.
User asks for a summary of the most critical reviewer comments; the AI synthesizes feedback from a prior peer review into actionable bullet points.
Graduate student wants to know if their reference list meets the journal’s limit of 50 items; the AI counts and advises removing five less relevant citations.
Author uploads a manuscript with equations; the AI checks LaTeX rendering, identifies a missing bracket, and suggests a correction.
Manuscript on social psychology shows excessive use of first‑person pronouns; language check recommends replacing them with passive constructions.
User requests a concise list of all figures needing caption improvements; the AI returns a markdown table with figure numbers and suggested captions.
Paper includes a reference to a conference proceeding without a URL; citation tool locates the online version and adds the missing link.
Author wants to know if their methodology description is sufficiently detailed; the AI compares it to standards and suggests adding a flow diagram.
Manuscript targeted at a multidisciplinary journal lacks a clear significance statement; structural suggestion adds a dedicated 'Significance' paragraph in the abstract.
User asks for a readability score; the language quality module calculates a Flesch‑Kincaid grade level and recommends simplifications.
Researcher submits a draft of a systematic review; the AI checks that PRISMA checklist items are addressed and flags missing flow diagram.
Author requests to see all instances of passive voice; the language check highlights each sentence and provides active‑voice alternatives.
Manuscript references a dataset without a DOI; citation check finds the dataset’s DOI on Zenodo and inserts it.
User wants a quick export of the review report to send to co‑authors; the system compiles selected sections into a markdown file with a table of contents.
Paper includes a figure legend that exceeds 150 words; the AI trims the legend while preserving essential information.
Author asks whether their statistical methods section complies with EQUATOR guidelines; the AI cross‑references and suggests adding power analysis details.
Manuscript submitted to a journal with a 3‑page limit for the introduction; the AI condenses the introduction by 20% without losing key points.
User wishes to verify that all in‑text citations have matching bibliography entries; the citation check reports two orphan citations and two unused references.
Research team wants to ensure their paper meets open‑access policies; the AI checks the target journal’s licensing and suggests appropriate statements.
Author provides a draft and asks for suggestions to improve the logical flow; the AI reorganizes paragraphs in the discussion for better coherence.
